name: Spoopy Skeleton War - Halloween Game Jam
name_original: Spoopy Skeleton War - Halloween Game Jam
description: A game made in Unity during a game jam hosted by my university, Harrisburg University of Science and Technology, in conjunction with the Moore College of Art and Design on Halloween 2017. HU provided programmers, and Moore provided artists, and we combined together to create two games (one per team). This was our "completed" game, I made the menus and some other fun stuff, and got to experiment quite a bit. While it isn't a full, or even really playable, game, I had a lot of fun making it and working with my coding partner and our two artists.
